blogPost.title: What are the biggest mistakes students make when they apply to undergraduate programs? Answer by Kristen Moon, founder and CEO @moon_prep. https://t.co/sn4JPDKFrn https://t.co/QC4H0izk95
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 学生が学部プログラムに応募する際に犯してしまう最大のミスとは？Answer by Kristen Moon, founder and CEO @moon_prep. https://t.co/sn4JPDKFrn https://t.co/QC4H0izk95
学生在申请本科课程时犯的最大错误是什么？回答者：Kristen Moon，创始人兼CEO @moon_prep。https://t.co/sn4JPDKFrn https://t.co/QC4H0izk95
學生在申請本科課程時犯的最大錯誤是什麼？回答者：Kristen Moon，創始人兼CEO @moon_prep。https://t.co/sn4JPDKFrn https://t.co/QC4H0izk95

previous.title: What self-care routines do actors follow? Answer by @brandonkgood(he/they), Writer: Big Mouth, Actor: Feel The Beat, Modern Love, Big Mouth. https://t.co/jawFSjWjLQ https://t.co/IbCRYOrJAo

localize.full_text: 俳優はどのようなセルフケアをしていますか？回答者：@brandonkgood(he/they), 脚本家。ビッグマウス、俳優。Feel The Beat」「Modern Love」「Big Mouth」 https://t.co/jawFSjWjLQ https://t.co/IbCRYOrJAo
